title: Aleene's 23473 Fabric Fusion Permanent Fabric Adhesive ,Clear,4oz
description: Fabric Fusion Permanent Adhesive is available in 4 ounce bottle. Unique clear water-based non-toxic urethane adhesive that provides a permanent fabric bond. Unlike others it is dry cleanable and does not string while applying to fabric. Use Fabric Fusion to adhere a variety of embellishments to fabric for a permanent bond including fabric pom poms rhinestones light and heavy trim plastic sequins and beads. Contains 4 ounces.
